description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to produce and control all different types of poison, as well as grants absolute immunity to poison, making the user a Poison Human. The poison can range from mild irritants to highly corrosive, deadly toxins.

users.circumstances: Magellan is revealed to be the user of this Devil Fruit, having consumed it before his debut.

abilityReveals.description: Magellan exhales poisonous smoke that immediately affects those who breathe it in. The poison is quick-acting and requires antidotes to counter its effects.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Magellan uses poison breath to attack Hannyabal for his insubordinate comments, demonstrating the power's potency.

abilityReveals.description: The user has absolute immunity to all forms of poison, making poison-based attacks completely ineffective against them.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Mentioned as an inherent ability of the Doku Doku no Mi when Domino explains Magellan's powers to Hancock.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Consuming poisoned food causes severe digestive issues

strengths.strength: Can create poisons ranging from mild irritants to deadly toxins
strengths.description: The fruit allows creation of various poison types with different potency levels.
User is completely immune to all forms of poison.

strengths.strength: Quick-acting poison that requires immediate antidotes
strengths.description: The poison works almost instantly, as shown when Hannyabal needed an immediate antidote.
